nodes.text: The U-20 Kingstrike was a precision laser cannon developed during the Cold War by the Alderaanian family House Ulgo. It was a newly created precision weapon with these cannons capable of being fitted onto a dreadnaught as well as giving them the capacity from striking a target from orbit with perfect accuracy.

Kamen Proy who was an agent for the Republic Strategic Information Service was undercover in House Ulgo where he learnt of the completion of the weapon. Proy later attempted to find a representative from the Galactic Republic to inform them of this threat as the Kingstrike was being dismantled for being shipped offworld from Alderaan.
This individual was tasked by Proy to journey to the Ulgo Shipping Facility at King's Pass in order to recover the dismantled superweapon before it was moved.
